title: 3  Model Evaluation
3  Model Evaluation
text:
3.2 Model Evaluation Criteria

Binary classification model evaluation criteria






Criteria
Assesment




GINI < 20 y K-S < 16
Bad. Model barely discriminates classes


20 ≤ GINI < 30 y 16 ≤ K-S < 24
Regular


30 ≤ GINI < 40 y 24 ≤ K-S < 32
Good


40 ≤ GINI < 50 y 32 ≤ K-S < 40
Very good


GINI ≥ 50 y K-S ≥ 40
Excellent







Kelleher, J. D., B. M. Namee, and A. D’Arcy. 2020. Fundamentals of Machine Learning for Predictive Data Analytics, Second Edition: Algorithms, Worked Examples, and Case Studies. MIT Press. https://books.google.es/books?id=UM\_tDwAAQBAJ.
